title: Cookie Settings
body: We use cookies and similar technologies that are necessary to operate the website. These cookies are used for personalization and to retain sessions when logging in only. You are free to decline the usage of personalization cookies on this site, but this will result in preferences not being saved. Note that necessary cookies used for logins will always be saved by using this site.
